    • Method Detail

      • writeMusicXml

        public boolean writeMusicXml()
        writes the data document to a file at this.file (it must be != null); if there is already a file with this name, it is replaces!
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured

      • writeMusicXml

        public boolean writeMusicXml(java.lang.String filename)
        writes the document to a file (filename should include the path and the extension)
        Parameters:
        filename - the filename string; it should include the path and the extension
        Returns:
        true if success, false if an error occured

      • exportMei

        public Mei exportMei(boolean useOnlineVerovio)
        converts the MusicXML data to MEI
        Parameters:
        useOnlineVerovio - true (uses the latest version of Verovio, requires Internet connection), false (use meico's internal Verovio version)
        Returns:
        the Mei instance or null if failed TODO: The current implementation based on Verovio does not work! And even if, the conversion of MusicXML features to MEI would be rather limited.
